## FilterBuilder.limit() method

Set `limit`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
limit(limit: number): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  limit | <code>number</code> | Maximum number of records to be returned |

`this`
